title: Important Update: ICAI CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) Exam Rescheduled to January 31, 2026
content:
# Important Update: ICAI CA Intermediate Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) Exam Rescheduled to January 31, 2026

Ek important update hai for all CA Intermediate students. The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Intermediate Examination, Group II, Paper 5 (Auditing and Ethics) ki exam date reschedule kar di hai.

The examination, originally slated for January 19, 2026, will now be conducted on January 31, 2026. This is a crucial announcement affecting many students across India and abroad.

Here are the key details:

*   **Paper Affected:** CA Intermediate, Group II, Paper 5 - Auditing and Ethics.
*   **Old Exam Date:** January 19, 2026 (Monday). (This was previously rescheduled from January 15, 2026, due to municipal elections in Maharashtra.)
*   **New Exam Date:** January 31, 2026 (Saturday).
*   **Exam Timings & Centres:** No changes in the examination timings (2:00 PM to 5:00 PM IST) and centres.
*   **Admit Cards:** Previously issued admit cards will remain valid for the rescheduled date. No need to download a new admit card.
*   **Other Examinations:** The schedule for all other CA Intermediate and Foundation papers remains unchanged.

Candidates are advised to take note of this change and adjust their study plans accordingly.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Visit the Official ICAI Website for updates](https://www.icai.org)

*Published on: 25 January 2026*
